name: Wolfram Wingerath

Fachtagung des GI-Fachbereichs (DBIS) Member of "Datenbank-Spektrum" Editorial Board since 2023, official GI journal (Databases & Information Retrieval groups) Program co-chair of 8th-12th Workshop on Scalable Cloud Data Management (SCDM) Program co-chair of GISP Workshop 2022, 1st GI Startup Platform Community Get Together Co-organizer of BTW 2015, 16.
